3: So that's the Polyphage... It's way too big!
I say we move forward stealthily if possible...
The Polyphage seems to have been expecting your arrival. It sends a powerful shock wave your way with an incredible roar.
All hands, brace yourself for the shock! Don't fall into the Red Tide! Protect Commandant!
Commandant and I are okay. That was one powerful roar, though...
We can't even get close to it now. We need to disable it temporarily somehow.
